question: [Explain] Turkce: (51, 154), (180, 146), (160, 176) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.

qas.question: [Explain] Turkce: (51, 154), (180, 146), (160, 176) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.
[Practice] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (51, 154), (180, 146), (160, 176). Provide only the area.
[Brief] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (51, 154), (180, 146), (160, 176). Provide only the perimeter.
